Articles.Content:
This is my replica (and an alright one IMO) of the Soviet MiG 21 aircraft. It is done in detail to the best of my abilities and flies well.

![0ko3VZn.png](http://i.imgur.com/0ko3VZn.png)

![GokkF28.png](http://i.imgur.com/GokkF28.png)

![HsDCfBc.png](http://i.imgur.com/HsDCfBc.png)

![XUK84cO.png](http://i.imgur.com/XUK84cO.png)

![vjfotiR.png](http://i.imgur.com/vjfotiR.png)

Just a word of warning, this craft is truely horrible at landing. This may be my fault in putting a full fuel tank in the front, but beware that it may take a skilled pilot to land this craft safely.

Hope everyone likes my first replica craft (and first post on the forums).

[http://www./download/qq9rs0j6fxb6cbx/Kerboyan-Gurekich+KiG+21.craft](http://www./download/qq9rs0j6fxb6cbx/Kerboyan-Gurekich+KiG+21.craft)

No offense but it doesnt look like a Mig-21 Fishbed at all. 

The -21 is a delta wing design. More like this....

![cpL6S6h.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cpL6S6h.jpg)

![0643588.jpg](http://cdn-www.airliners.net/aviation-photos/photos/8/8/5/0643588.jpg)
There's always room for improvement. Thanks for the tip though.
